text: Ewa Durska (born 27 February 1977) is a Paralympian athlete from Poland competing mainly in category T20 shot put events. She is a two time Paralympic gold medalist in the shot put at the 2000 Games in Sydney and the 2012 Games in London. Her Paralympic career was put on hold after a sporting controversy at the 2000 Games saw her classification removed for the next two cycle of Paralympic Games. Durska is a world leader in her sport and is a four time World Championship gold medalist. ==References== == External links == * Category:Paralympic athletes of Poland Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Poland Category:Living people Category:Polish female shot putters Category:World record holders in Paralympic athletics Category:1977 births Category:People from Nowogard Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Ewa Durska
